attributes.action: Set a minimum age limit of 40 for MPs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Most of our current MPs wouldn't recognise a good law if it smacked them in the face, have little common sense, and no idea about managing life in the real world.  Sound judgement and wisdom which is required of our MPs only comes from life experience outside parliament, which many of our MPs lack. Hence the minimum age thay should be allowed to represent us should be 40.

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
